import React from 'react' import { Field, reduxForm } from 'redux-form' import { login } from '../api/api' const LoginForm = (props) => { return props.isAuth ? :
Remember me
} const LoginReduxForm = reduxForm({ form: 'login' })(LoginForm) const Login = (props) => { const onSubmit = (data) => { login(data.login, data.password, data.remember) } return (

Login

) } export default Login
